item.description: collect dnsdist stats and send to zabbix

item.name: downstream-timeouts
item.description: Number of queries not answer in time by a backend.

item.description: Average response latency in microseconds of the last 10000 packets.

item.description: Average response latency in microseconds of the last 1000000 packets.

item.name: latency-slow
item.description: Number of queries answered in more than 1 second.

item.description: Number of queries answered in 50-100 ms.

item.description: Number of queries answered in 100-1000 ms.

item.name: servfail-responses
item.description: Number of servfail answers received from backends.
